1.text: ●Scene: First visit to the Lucrea Village

4.name: Sol
4.text:
"Ooooo... So this is Lucrea Village... There are
so many people other than Sensei... Amazing..."

5.name: Sol
5.text:
"It's so lively and nice here... It feels really
refreshing!"

7.name: Sol
7.text:
"A fountain!!!! A watermill!!!! A carriage!!!!
Ohhhhhhh... Signs of civilization..."

12.name: Narration
12.text:
As Sol walked through the village streets, the
villagers all turned back in surprise. A beautiful
girl with a golden dragon's tail, and moreover,
half-naked like the mermaid princess that a
troubadour would sing about - it was impossible
not to stand out.

13.name: Narration
13.text:
And the passing red-haired adventurer also
remembered her figure vividly.

17.name: Erick
17.text:
"Ah! You're the golden dragon's child who helped
me back then!! I've been looking for you!"

23.name: Erick
23.text:
"I see, I see. I've heard the rumors... So you're
the golden dragon raised by Eni-sensei."

24.name: Erick
24.text:
"I never got to thank you properly. Thank you so
much for back then. I'm Erick, an adventurer
working around here."

26.name: Erick
26.text:
"Alright, it's not really a repayment, but since
we've come this far, let's consider it fate. I'll
accompany you, Sol!"

28.name: Erick
28.text:
"Eni-sensei asked me to help you if I saw Sol.
I'll guide you to the tavern where adventurers
gather!"

29.name: Erick
29.text:
"It's called the 'Headless Beauty' Inn, and that's
where we hang out. If you're looking for
companions, that's probably the best place to
start."

30.name: Sol
30.text:
"Wow, that's really impressive! ...How can you
tell she's a beauty even without a head?"
